title: This Week's Top Stories - Kim Jong-un Weeps, Amy Coney Barrett Dodges Questions & American Militias
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Kim Jong-un Weeps, Amy Coney Barrett Dodges Questions & American Militias
description:
Kim Jong-un breaks down crying during a parade, Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett gets cagey, Trevor examines U.S. militias, and President Trump pushes anti-Biden conspiracy theories.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
